note_asian: South Asian / Indian population uses lower cutoffs: overweight ≥23, obese ≥27.5

under_weight.description: Below healthy weight; risk of nutritional deficiencies and reduced immunity

normal.description: Healthy weight range associated with lowest health risks

overweight.description: Above healthy weight; increased risk of metabolic conditions

obese.description: Significantly above healthy weight; high risk of diabetes, CVD, etc.

extremely_obese.description: Severe health risk associated with extreme obesity
